name: Fast Car Racing: Highway Sim
description:
This is the latest car simulator game in the city, forest and desert environments. Conquer the city streets with drift racing skills. Get an amazing thrill and excitement in this highway game. This real city traffic racing car game is about drifting, riding and racing in the desert area. The ultimate fast paced real car master 3d game set in city streets with unique cars.
Real car Physics.
Heavy Duty Sport cars.
Realistic driving experience.
High quality 3D stunning graphics.
Extremely fast and addictive gameplay.
The most realistic 3D car driving simulation.
Amazing Quality sound effects.
